para.text: An owner who has a dog over the age of 4 months shall have the dog vaccinated against rabies and distemper. Pursuant to rules issued by the Mayor, an owner of a cat over the age of 4 months shall have that cat vaccinated against rabies.
The Mayor shall provide a free anti-rabies vaccination clinic annually.

annotations.annotation: Delegation of authority under Law 3-30, see Mayor’s Order 83-206, August 2, 1983.
